tag_list: arjenlentz, mysql, mariadb, openquery, upstarta, bluehackers, osdc
overview:
Arjen is a parallel entrepreneur, building business and other projects on the basis of the Upstarta principles.

Based in Brisbane Australia, Arjen is currently mainly involved with running Open Query, business mentoring through Upstarta, and various not-for-profit initiatives such as BlueHackers and the Open Source Developers’ Conference.

Arjen started his professional life (late 80s) as an independent software developer (mainly C); after his migration from The Netherlands he joined MySQL AB in 2001 as employee#25, helping build the company in various positions including technical writer (documentation), trainer, global community relations, conference program chair, and support engineering. He left in 2007 just before MySQL’s acquisition by Sun Microsystems.
